title: 820-00239-09 slow, not liquid damaged
message:
i took out the board, not water damaged at all
very slow, fans are full speed, otherwise works

with HW monitor it says that 3 values are 33 degrees than 5 sec later it shows 129 degrees, it keeps cycling those values for the cpu related temps

title: 820-00239-09 slow, not liquid damaged
message: First of all, try known good trackpad board and flex.

title: 820-00239-09 slow, not liquid damaged
message: Yep try known good trackpad and cable first best to rule out parts. Next, would be inspect U5870 area

title: 820-00239-09 slow, not liquid damaged
message: solved, U5870  and the area looked perfect, but that is the chip doing all weird stuff, cause the temp issue jumping up and down was cpu proximity and around related, so i desoldered the chip, right away 3 pad came off, i did not force it , the chip was lifted after the solder melted, then the 4.th pad off easily too, i wired them based on the boardview and now works fine, laptop was not dropped, i think the pads are that crap quality
